data.message:
I honestly think that this is Eminem vs Drake is for publicity. They're both very talented. Albeit one is slightly more. 
Drake and Eminem are both at the top spectrum of music and rap but they're almost different kinds of music. 
I'm team Eminem but a Mashup between them would be incredible if it was a duo-diss track

replies.message: Drake is nowhere near as talented as Em. He doesn't write all his shit. Including some of his biggest songs. Anybody can rap and sing like he does, not many people can write and rap like Em.

Did you even read what Jordan said?
No?
I didn't think so
